title: Michael Che | Trump’s Deranged Response to the George Floyd Protests: A Closer Look
description:
Seth takes a closer look at the countless instances of violent police escalation in response to the protests over the murder of George Floyd.

Then, he talks to SNL's Michael Che, who shares his thoughts on the Black Lives Matter protests and taping SNL from home.

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
